name: All the lights are off when I arrive
description: I once lived near a large building with mirrored facades. It was quite different from the other buildings around him, which were much lower and older than he was. It was like a piece that didn't fit. At night it was lit up with blue neon lights, and during the day there was invariably some worker hanging from it, cleaning its windows; it was as if, in a perverse symmetry of very bad taste, he displayed both as decoration: the lights at night, the worker during the day.
